test_cases.description: Test searching for files using full file name
test_cases.expected_result: Files containing 'cavalier' in name should be displayed with matching text highlighted
test_cases.actual_result: Search returned 4 files (cavalier-tv.png variants) with 'cavalier' highlighted in yellow
test_cases.notes: Search includes full-text search within folder content, breadcrumb updated to show 'SEARCH CAVALIER'

test_cases.description: Test searching for files using partial text match
steps: Enter 'bat' in search box (partial match for 'batch_image')
test_cases.expected_result: Files containing 'bat' substring should be displayed
test_cases.actual_result: Search returned batch_image_3.png with 'bat' portion highlighted
test_cases.notes: Minimum 3 characters required for search, search has 400ms throttle

test_cases.description: Test sorting files by last modified date
test_cases.expected_result: Files and folders should be reordered by last modified date
test_cases.actual_result: Content reordered with Templates, PermissionsTestFolder, Groups appearing first (most recently modified)
test_cases.notes: Sort order changed from Alphabetical (Badges, Groups, Images...) to Last Modified (Templates, PermissionsTestFolder...)

test_cases.description: Test sorting files by upload date
test_cases.expected_result: Files and folders should be reordered by upload date
test_cases.actual_result: Content reordered with Images, Templates, Users, Badges appearing first
test_cases.notes: Order differs from Last Modified, showing different date criteria are applied

test_cases.expected_result: Files and folders should be sorted A-Z
test_cases.actual_result: Content sorted alphabetically: Badges, Groups, Images, PermissionsTestFolder, Templates, Users, WorkflowTestFolder
test_cases.notes: Folders appear first in alphabetical order, followed by files in alphabetical order

test_cases.description: Test navigating into folders and using breadcrumb navigation
steps: Click on 'Images' folder to navigate into it
Click 'Home' in breadcrumb to navigate back
test_cases.expected_result: Should be able to navigate into folders and use breadcrumb to navigate back
test_cases.actual_result: Successfully navigated into Images folder (breadcrumb showed HOME > IMAGES), saw subfolders (MoveTestFolder, Publisher, SecureFolderTest2026) and files. Clicking Home breadcrumb returned to root folder.
test_cases.notes: SecureFolderTest2026 displayed with lock icon indicating secure folder type

test_cases.description: Test searching for files with special characters in name
test_cases.expected_result: Files with special characters should be found
test_cases.notes: Parentheses and other special characters handled correctly in search

test_cases.description: Test search behavior when no matches found
test_cases.actual_result: Displayed 'Your Search Produced No Results' message with search icon
test_cases.notes: Clear user feedback when no matches found
